doc.title: 25 to Life
doc.plot: '25 To Life' tells the parallel stories of Terence, a twenty-something screenwriter with writer's block and his fictional alter-ego, Clarence. How do each deal with the writing process? The realities of bills & mortgages? Their wives' ticking biological clocks? and how they try to save their floundering marriages.

'25 To Life' tells the parallel stories of Terence, a twenty-something screenwriter with writer's block and his fictional alter-ego, Clarence. How do each deal with the writing process? The realities of bills & mortgages? Their wives' ticking biological clocks? and how they try to save their floundering marriages.
